title: Hello I'm SaSan
subtitle: Software developer | OPen-Source Enthusiast | Love art and philosophy

items.content:
Thanks for stopping!
 My name is Sasan. I’m a software developer from Tehran, Iran.I have perform works of new media in Tehran’s exhibitions with my friend . I have spent the following 8 years mostly building various web applications within product teams while maintaining a personal creative practice.I have bachlor's degree in computer software engineering from isfahan univercity of applied science and technology. Currently, I’m a software developer at Freelance. Sometimes I teach.I play music by Sonic-Pi.
